description.p: The easiest way to convert your multimedia files to the most popular formats.

ul.li: Conversion of multiple files at the same time
Possibility of changing the output folder
Close the application at any time with Ctrl + Q
Video - MP4, MPG, AVI, WMV, FLV, MKV, 3GP, MOV, VOB, OGV, WEBM
Audio - MP3, WMA, OGG, WAV, AAC, FLAC, AIFF, MMF, M4A
Images - JPG, BMP, PNG, TIF, GIF, TGA
